response.original_title: The Recovered Films of Nicholas Fedorov
response.overview: An unofficial collection of various surreal and crude short animations and skits created by Nicholas Fedorov during 2014 - 2016. During 2017, Fedorov wiped away a majority of his content with only a small amount of it being preserved. He still creates content under a different alias (Proxima 64) yet prefers to have people focus on his newer content, though would remaster some early animations if he has the original files. It is unknown if he has all of his old files as he has only been able to remaster very few videos. Fedorov was a teen around the time he has made the following films and has since apologized for any bad behavior he exhibited while he was making these videos and is improving himself and his work.  This is for archival purposes only.  https://archive.org/details/the-recovered-films-of-nicholas-fedorov
response.title: The Recovered Films of Nicholas Fedorov
